channel.title: [pi]Rapier doesnt actually have the stab emote
channel.description: So on my server, the rapier has the stab option like on the combat tab, but it doesnt have the stab emote. how do i make it have the stab emote??

item.title: [pi]Rapier doesnt actually have the stab emote
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

Go to CombatAssistant.java
Search For

if(weaponName.endsWith("dagger")) { return 412; }

Right Under That add This

if(weaponName.contains("chaotic rapier")) { return 386; }

Find

[code]case 4153: // granite maul
		return 1665;[/code]

Under that put

case 18349: // Item ID return 386; //Animation ID Chaotic rapier

Read full topic
item.source: [pi]Rapier doesnt actually have the stab emote

item.title: [pi]Rapier doesnt actually have the stab emote
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

You have to change the model for it…for PI I honestly don’t know where the models are kept…I assuming in the client like Delta lol…but uhm it isn’t the model itself its the code for the model which is in one of the java files called class8(for example it might not actually be class8)…

I suggest using a file searcher and look for the word rapier and then change the animations of it.

Thats all I can help you with(if thats even close to right since I haven’t looked at a PI)

Read full topic
